Welcome to SkyCast LOAD
Welcome to SkyCast! This guide will cover key features of the app and navigation directions. Scroll to a specific section for details. Happy Scrolling! How to Use SkyCast In the Home screen, you\'ll find a dropdown menu to select your preferred city. Press the \"LOAD\"
button to obtain the latest weather information for that city. The app will fetch and display the current weather information for that city by displaying the weather icon and temperature using live data from our API. Manage Your Favorite Locations The City Fragment allows you to customize your weather experience by selecting the cities you care
about most. Simply check the boxes next to your preferred cities, and they\’ll be instantly added to the dropdown menu in the Home Fragment. This makes it easy to quickly switch between locations and stay updated on the weather wherever you go. Want to de-clutter your list? Just uncheck a city, and it will be removed from the Home Fragment dropdown. Tailor your weather app to your needs in just a few taps! Want to Meet the Team? Get to know the minds behind the Weather App! The Profile Fragment introduces you to our team of passionate developers, designers, and innovators. Learn more about the team committed to delivering accurate and reliable weather updates by visiting our profile page.
